text: The 2014-15 Red Bull Salzburg season was the 82nd season in club history. Red Bull Salzburg finished the season as champions of the Bundesliga and the ÖFB- Cup for the second season in a row. Salzburg was knocked out of the Champions League by Malmö FF in the playoff round. In the Europa League they reached the round of 32 before defeated by Villarreal. ==Squad== 2014/15 * Goalkeepers:31 Péter Gulácsi (34/0) 33 Alexander Walke (3/0), 40 Fabian Bredlow (0/0) * Defenders:2 Benno Schmitz (21/0), 4 Peter Ankersen (21/1), 5 Andre Ramalho (31/1) 6 Christian Schwegler (21/2), 17 Andreas Ulmer (21/2), 25 Isaac Vorsah (0/0), Asger Sörensen (1/0) 36 Martin Hinteregger (31/1),45 Duje Caleta-Car (7/0), 47 Lukas Gugganig (1/0) * Midfielders: 7 Marcel Sabitzer (33/19), 8 Naby Keita (30/5),11 Felipe Pires (7/1), 13 Stefan Ilsanker (31/0), 14 Valon Berisha (14/4), 20 David Atanga (0/0), 24 Christoph Leitgeb (18/0), 37 Valentino Lazaro (25/4), 41 Konrad Laimer (8/0), 43 Ante Roguljic (1/0) 77 Massimo Bruno (24/6) * Forwards:9 Marco Djuricin (11/2), 18 Takumi Minamino (14/3), 26 Jonatan Soriano (32/31),42 Nils Quaschner (10/0), 46 Smail Prevljak (1/0) * Coaching staff: Adolf Hütter (Head coach), Zsolt Löw (Assistance coach), Herbert Ilsanker (Goalkeeper coach) FC Salzburg Wiki ==Matches== Austria Soccer ==Table== Team M W D L Goals Points 1\.
